mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_business (business_id, wechat_pay, wechat_rate, wechat_t_0, wechat_industry, wechat_type, wechat_num, alipay, ali_rate, ali_t_0, ali_industry, ali_type, alipay_num, business_uid) VALUES (#{businessId}, #{wechatPay}, #{wechatRate}, #{wechatT0}, #{wechatIndustry}, #{wechatType}, #{wechatNum}, #{alipay}, #{aliRate}, #{aliT0}, #{aliIndustry}, #{aliType}, #{alipayNum}, #{businessUid})
